reviewText: Money well spent. Even though I already owned all three I bought this to reduce the number of DVD cases on my shelves. All three movies are exceptional thrillers. "Kiss the Girls" involves women being kidnapped and tortured or killed and the attempt to find them by Forensic Detective Alex Cross played by Morgan Freeman once the victim played by Ashley Judd escapes. "Along Came a Spider" is about a young school girl being kidnapped and the investigation by Morgan Freeman that as Retired detective/Author Dr. Alex Cross follows it. It is a pretty good story that will keep you guessing who is involved. "Double Jeopardy" is about a woman played by Ashley Judd accused of killing her husband and going to prison and after she is out she finds he is alive, so she plots her revenge. Tommy Lee Jones plays her parole officer. I highly recommend this set. Good Quality DVDs with one normal size DVD case. Plenty of replayability. If you enjoyed these catch "Bone Collector", "Murder of Crows", and "Shoot to Kill". - C. Luster
Title: Edge of Your Seat Collection: (Kiss the Girls / Along Came a Spider / Double Jeopardy)

reviewText: I have always been a  fan of author James Patterson. The treatment of these movie is very close to the novels. Ashley Judd was very good in her portrayal in both of her roles.
Title: Edge of Your Seat Collection: (Kiss the Girls / Along Came a Spider / Double Jeopardy)

reviewText: Buy this movie if you want to be at the end of your seat.  Great!!!  A good suspense movie gets the blood flowing!!
Title: Edge of Your Seat Collection: (Kiss the Girls / Along Came a Spider / Double Jeopardy)

reviewText: I originally thought that these were the BluRay versions, but even though they are DVD format; my player up scales them to HD.  These 3 are awesome movies & were sold at a great price!!
Title: Edge of Your Seat Collection: (Kiss the Girls / Along Came a Spider / Double Jeopardy)

reviewText: you get three movies and all of them are good. Ashley Judd did an exceptional acting job. If you haven't seen double jeopardy you must see it. The company sent the order right away and it was in mint condition.
Title: Edge of Your Seat Collection: (Kiss the Girls / Along Came a Spider / Double Jeopardy)

reviewText: I love James patterson books, so I knew I would enjoy his suspense in these movies.  They are not for the faint hearted, that's for sure, but they met and exceeded my expectations.  I like it when the good guy wins.
Title: Edge of Your Seat Collection: (Kiss the Girls / Along Came a Spider / Double Jeopardy)

reviewText: This is a great collection to group together, and each movie is A+. Ashley Judd and Morgan Freeman are at their usual best. This set features a repackaging of the original individual releases in thinpak format. For collectors, individual case artwork is the original release versions, again, just in a thinkpak format. The new photoshop images are only for the outer box slipcase pictured here. If you like bad movies, this is not the set for you.
Title: Edge of Your Seat Collection: (Kiss the Girls / Along Came a Spider / Double Jeopardy)

reviewText: If you are a Morgan Freeman and Ashley Judd fan, this trio of movies is a great selection all wrapped up into one package.  This is definitely a "must buy" for those who love movies of mystery, crime, suspense and drama. The title "Edge of Your Seat Collection" definitely met all of my expectations.
summary: Great Buy for Three Great Movies
Title: Edge of Your Seat Collection: (Kiss the Girls / Along Came a Spider / Double Jeopardy)

reviewText: Rated it 4 stars because two of the movies were great, the third was so-so.  I would still recommend it.
Title: Edge of Your Seat Collection: (Kiss the Girls / Along Came a Spider / Double Jeopardy)
